section.name: Snapshots
section.p: Functor has not yet had an official binary release. Daily, Gump-generated builds are available however.

dl.dd: The latest pre-build JAR archive is availble at http://gump.covalent.net/jars/latest/commons-functor/. See http://gump.covalent.net/jars/ for previous versions.
JavaDoc-generated API documentation is available at http://nagoya.apache.org/gump/javadoc/jakarta-commons-sandbox/functor/target/dist/docs/api/.

section.p: See http://cvs.apache.org/builds/gump/latest/commons-functor.html for the status of the latest Gump generated build.
